thread.title: Kim Kardashian BLASTS "rude" sisters Kourtney and Khloe: "F**k you. I do have a life."
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian BLASTS "rude" sisters Kourtney and Khloe: "F**k you. I do have a life."

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Kim Kardashian BLASTS "rude" sisters Kourtney and Khloe: "F**k you. I do have a life."
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Kim Kardashian took to Snapchat to unleash a foul-mouthed rant aimed squarely at her sisters Kourtney and Khloe – after they “rudely” kept her waiting. 
The girls had left their sister waiting for her personal trainer for half an hour – after they turned up late to their session with the same coach. 
And Kim took to Snapchat to let them know just what she thought of them. Read More Kim Kardashian ranted on Snapchat She was NOT happy with her sisters Kourtney and Khloe Kim Kardashian was left waiting for her personal trainer 
“So me and my friend Nikki are waiting for [our trainer] Joe to get here because my sisters’ workout ran 30 minutes late,” she said. 
“Thanks a s.” 
She added: “Okay. Seriously, Kourtney and Khloe: f**k you. This is so rude. I have been sitting in my garage waiting for the trainer for 30 minutes. I do have a life.” 
When coach Joe finally arrived, Kim took to Snapchat to say: “Oh look who decided to show up! Look who decided to show up. Who was late? … Tell me, Joe. Who was late?” Read More Kim Kardashian was upset with her sisters (Photo: E!) Kourtney and Khloe Kardashian were left in the dog house (Photo: Splash News) 
Joe admitted that Kourtney, 37, was to blame for the delay. 
“Oh, Kourtney. Okay,” said Kim. 
Khloe hit back on her own Snapchat, calling Kim “The queen of being late for workouts.” 
Kourtney justified her lateness to Khloe saying: “You’ve been hanging out with me in the kitchen!” 
Kim isn't afraid to overshare about her life and yesterday she made a frank admission about her first hot and heavy night with husband Kanye West. 
Kim told fans 20 secrets about her life on her website. 
And number 15 revealed that Kim thinks temperature in the bedroom is very important – something Kanye agrees on. 
“I love only hot rooms and hate when the air conditioning is on,” she explained. "I knew Kanye and I were meant to be when I slept over and he had the heat on.” Kim Kardashian posts several pictures of her and Kanye online 
Meanwhile, for everyone who has ever had a brace and been stuck with a permanent retainer, you might be surprised to learn Kim also wears one. 
She also cracks her hands every single morning, and cilantro, mustard, peppers, blue cheese and red velvet are among her most hated foods. 
The yummy mummy also admits she sleeps with her eyes open which "scares the s**t out of people". Kim Kardashian, North West, Saint West and Jonathan Cheban Lunching at Cipriani Restaurant in NYC (Photo: Splash News) 
When she was growing up, Kim attended tennis camp but almost got kicked out when she was caught snogging a boy. 
"My dad came to yell at me," she revealed. Like us on Facebook
